name: RPA.Excel.Files
doc:
Robot Framework library for manipulating Excel files.

Note: To run macros or load password protected worksheets, please use the Excel application library.

keywords.name: Append Rows To Worksheet
keywords.doc:
Append values to the end of the worksheet.

param content:Rows of values to append
param name:Name of worksheet to append to
param header:Set rows according to existing header row
param start:Start of data, NOTE: Only required when headers is True
keywords.shortdoc: Append values to the end of the worksheet.

keywords.name: Create Workbook
keywords.doc:
Create and open a new Excel workbook.

param path:Default save path for workbook
param fmt:Format of workbook, i.e. xlsx or xls
keywords.shortdoc: Create and open a new Excel workbook.

keywords.name: Create Worksheet
keywords.doc:
Create a new worksheet in the current workbook.

param name:Name of new worksheet
param content:Optional content for worksheet
param exist_ok:If False, raise an error if name is already in use
keywords.shortdoc: Create a new worksheet in the current workbook.

keywords.name: Find Empty Row
keywords.doc:
Find the first empty row after existing content.

param name:Name of worksheet
keywords.shortdoc: Find the first empty row after existing content.

keywords.name: Get Active Worksheet
keywords.doc: Get the name of the worksheet which is currently active.
keywords.shortdoc: Get the name of the worksheet which is currently active.

keywords.name: List Worksheets
keywords.doc: List all names of worksheets in the given workbook.
keywords.shortdoc: List all names of worksheets in the given workbook.

keywords.name: Open Workbook
keywords.doc:
Open an existing Excel workbook.

param path:path to Excel file

keywords.name: Read Worksheet
keywords.doc:
Read the content of a worksheet into a list of dictionaries.

Each key in the dictionary will be either values from the header row, or Excel-style column letters.

param name:Name of worksheet to read
param header:If True, use the first row of the worksheet as headers for the rest of the rows.
keywords.shortdoc: Read the content of a worksheet into a list of dictionaries.

keywords.name: Read Worksheet As Table
keywords.doc:
Read the content of a worksheet into a Table container. Allows sorting/filtering/manipulating using the RPA.Tables library.

param name:Name of worksheet to read
param header:If True, use the first row of the worksheet as headers for the rest of the rows.
param trim:Remove all empty rows from the end of the worksheet
param start:Row index to start reading data from (1-indexed)
keywords.shortdoc: Read the content of a worksheet into a Table container. Allows sorting/filtering/manipulating using the `RPA.Tables` library.

keywords.name: Remove Worksheet
keywords.doc:
Remove a worksheet from the active workbook.

param name:Name of worksheet to remove
keywords.shortdoc: Remove a worksheet from the active workbook.

keywords.name: Rename Worksheet
keywords.doc:
Rename an existing worksheet in the active workbook.

param src_name:Current name of worksheet
param dst_name:Future name of worksheet
keywords.shortdoc: Rename an existing worksheet in the active workbook.

keywords.name: Save Workbook
keywords.doc:
Save the active workbook.

param path:Path to save to. If not given, uses path given when opened or created.

keywords.name: Set Active Worksheet
keywords.doc:
Set the active worksheet.

param value:Index or name of worksheet

keywords.name: Set Worksheet Value
keywords.doc:
Set a cell value in the given worksheet.

param row:Index of row to write, e.g. 3
param column:Name or index of column, e.g. C or 7
param value:New value of cell
param name:Name of worksheet
keywords.shortdoc: Set a cell value in the given worksheet.

keywords.name: Worksheet Exists
keywords.doc: Return True if worksheet with given name is in workbook.
keywords.shortdoc: Return True if worksheet with given name is in workbook.
